outer_ring_channels.why: Too expensive for early stage [GIẢ ĐỊNH]

middle_ring_channels.why: VN market heavily uses social [TỪ PLAN]

inner_ring_channels.why: Primary acquisition channel for VN B2C [TỪ PLAN]

prioritized_experiments.hypothesis: Targeted ads to urban 25-40 demo will yield CAC < $10 with 2% CTR [ĐỀ XUẤT]
prioritized_experiments.success_criteria: CAC < target, ROAS > 2x, conversion rate > 1.5% [ĐỀ XUẤT]
prioritized_experiments.next_steps_if_success: Scale budget 3-5x, optimize winning creatives [ĐỀ XUẤT]
prioritized_experiments.next_steps_if_fail: Test different targeting/creative, or pivot to channel #2 [ĐỀ XUẤT]

prioritized_experiments.hypothesis: Ranking for long-tail keywords will drive organic traffic at $0 CAC in 3-6 months [ĐỀ XUẤT]

test_design.content_plan: 2-3 blog posts/week targeting buyer intent keywords
test_design.seo_tactics: On-page optimization, backlink building, technical SEO

prioritized_experiments.success_criteria: Top 10 rankings for 10+ keywords, 500+ organic visitors/month [ĐỀ XUẤT]
prioritized_experiments.next_steps_if_success: Double content output, expand keyword targets [ĐỀ XUẤT]
prioritized_experiments.next_steps_if_fail: Reassess keyword difficulty, improve content quality [GIẢ ĐỊNH]

prioritized_experiments.hypothesis: 20% of customers will refer friends with right incentive, K-factor > 0.5 [ĐỀ XUẤT]

test_design.incentive_structure: Referrer gets 10% off, referee gets 15% off first order
test_design.promotion: In-app prompt, email campaign, post-purchase thank you

prioritized_experiments.success_criteria: K-factor > 0.3, referral CAC < 50% of paid CAC [ĐỀ XUẤT]
prioritized_experiments.next_steps_if_fail: Test different incentive structure or timing [GIẢ ĐỊNH]

month_1_2.focus: Test top 3 channels (Facebook Ads, SEO, Referral)

month_3_4.focus: Double down on winners, test 2 more channels from middle ring

channel_mix_strategy.short_term_vs_long_term: Front-load paid for traction, build organic flywheel [ĐỀ XUẤT]
channel_mix_strategy.diversification_principle: Don't rely on single channel - aim for 3+ proven channels [GIẢ ĐỊNH]
